metadata.synopsis: Arka talks to herself while manning the Grove's defences, working herself up for the imminent battle against attacking goblins. She mentions her dead friend Kanon and all the goblins she intends to kill in his name.

0.speaker: Arka
0.text: All this bloody waiting. I'll go find those goblins myself if they don't appear soon.
0.context: NodeContext: Keyed up, ready to fight

1.speaker: Arka
1.text: Any moment now... come on you zurgnak cowards, attack!
1.context: NodeContext: zurgnak = infernal for 'fucking/damned'. Pronounced zurg-NAK. Keyed up, ready to fight

2.speaker: Arka
2.text: When will they attack? I've a score to settle.
2.context: NodeContext: Keyed up, ready to fight

3.speaker: Arka
3.text: Come on, cowards. Time to pay for what you did to Kanon...
3.context: NodeContext: Keyed up, ready to fight
